info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, Warren, northeastern Fulton, northern Saratoga and northwestern Washington Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indian Lake to 6 miles northeast of Wells to near Northville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds of around 40 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Warrensburg, Indian Lake, Lake George Village, Fort Edward, Corinth, Johnsburg, Edinburg, Northville, Hague, Wells, Eagle Point Campground, Scaroon Manor Public Campground, Day Center, Bolton Landing, Glens Falls North, Rogers Rock Campground, West Glens Falls and Lake Luzerne Campground. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
